forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: a set of commands to allow scripting to happen when you enter a world

comments.text: as an examle, you could make an animation of sorts for when you enter a world so that you don't just pop into existance. or you could play a sound to annouce your arrival.
it's a small thing, sure, but it could be fun to use, especially with the creativity of some people here.

thread.latestCommentText: it's a small thing, sure, but it could be fun to use, especially with the creativity of some people here.
